title: Besu stuck at block 15145015

labels.name: TeamChupa
labels.description: GH issues worked on by Chupacabara Team

body:
Besu was syncing Main net from scratch. It gets stuck importing block 15145015. Restart did not resolve the problem.

Version: besu/v22.4.4/linux-aarch_64/openjdk-java-17
Debian 11.4 - no VM. no docker
ARM v8 (X-Gene 1), 64 MB RAM, 2 TB SSD w/ 300+ GB free
